name: @ln-maf/aws
description: AWS steps for MAF. This contains S3, DynamoDB, SQS, ECS, Cloudwatch, and Lambda stepDefinitions

scripts.test: npm run localstack:start && npm run test:run && npm run localstack:stop
scripts.test:coverage: npm run localstack:start && npm run test:run:coverage && npm run localstack:stop
scripts.test:run: wait-on tcp:localhost:${LOCALSTACK_PORT:-4566} && mkdir -p ../../test/report && npm run terraform:apply && npm run cucumber:exec && npm run test:finalize
scripts.test:run:coverage: wait-on tcp:localhost:${LOCALSTACK_PORT:-4566} && mkdir -p ../../test/report && npm run terraform:apply && npm run cucumber:exec:coverage && npm run test:finalize
scripts.cucumber:exec:coverage: AWSENV=LOCALSTACK npx nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text --report-dir=../../coverage npx cucumber-js -f json:../../test/report/aws.json --require "stepDefinitions/*.js" features/$FEATURE_FILE
scripts.terraform:apply: cd terraform && terraform init -upgrade && terraform apply -auto-approve -var="localstack_port=${LOCALSTACK_PORT:-4566}"
